# forEach(_:)

**Instance Method**

Iterate over four elements per step.

## Declaration

```swift
func forEach(_ body: (Element, Element, Element, Element) throws -> Void) rethrows
```

## Iterating the elements of a buffer

- **forEach(_:)**: Iterate over pairs of elements.
- **forEach(_:)**: Iterate over three elements per step.
- **usingRate(_:)**: New object with updated rate.
